name: Soap
description:
01. Rainy Day    
02. Break My Ways  
03. Disconnected    
04. Another Day    
05. Who Even Knows    
06. Feel    
07. Sponge   
08. Empty Spaces    
09. Bags    
10. Alejandro    
11. Zude    
12. Soap   
13. River    
14. Creepy Song 

Soap's self titled album was the first full length recording released. The album contains fourteen original tracks. 

It was recorded December 6th thru 14th 2003 by Neil Holmquist at Dungeon Studios in Indiana.

name: Lather
description:
01. Out Of Luck    
02. Stealing Potatoes   
03. Get A Hold Of Your Life    
04. Endless Directions   
05. Not That   
06. Wheelfoot   
07. Penguin    
08. Novelty Item   
09. Classical Jam    
10. Miles Dankis    
11. Attached 

“Lather” is the Soap’s second full length CD release. Offering eleven dynamic songs, it is a truly inspired blend by one of today's most gifted bands. “Lather” is a unique album that values the unknown areas of improvisation as much as the construction of towering compositions. 

On “Lather”, listeners are treated to lush, polyrhythmic tones that crackle with the brainy togetherness of jazz and the freewheeling attitude of rock. With hints of funk and fusion, Soap’s sound takes on a life of its own. Guitar solos are alternately ferocious and restrained, keyboards break the surface of the music and plunge back into its depths, and the drums and bass are as constant as the rise and fall of the sun. 

The CD was recorded at Apocalypse Cow, in Montgomery, IL, and mixed and mastered by Bill McElroy at Slipped Disc in Ashland, VA

name: The Quick Of It
description:
1. C'n'N
2. We're Going Under
3. Traffic

From the backroads of Illinois, Soap has their heads bound together by the knotty hairs of rock, jazz, hip hop, and funk. An eclectic mix, they've purified the ears of 10,000 Lakes Festival, filtered the minds of the east coast, and cleansed souls by the hundreds in the midwest, and are psyched to play near you.

Soap is an experimental rock fusion jam band. Soap is a cleansing agent made from the salts of vegetable or animal fats; Money offered as a bribe; Street names for gamma hydroxybutyrate; Soap is like a good feeling; and like a good feeling you can't help sharing it, pass it along.
